source.56d8a2e3:
pizza.price_rupiah = pizza.price_rupiah.str.replace('Rp', '').str.replace(',', '').astype(float)
pizza.diameter = pizza.diameter.str.replace(' inch', '').astype(float)
pizza[['price_rupiah', 'diameter']].describe()
source.92c9af28:
# Price Rupiah Distribution
plt.figure(figsize=(9, 6))
sns.histplot(x='price_rupiah', data=pizza, kde=True)
plt.show()
source.edbff4d7:
# Size vs Price
display(pizza.groupby('size', sort=False)['price_rupiah'].describe())

size_order = ['jumbo', 'XL', 'large', 'medium', 'reguler', 'small']

fig, ax = plt.subplots(ncols=2, figsize=(14, 6))
sns.countplot(x='size', data=pizza, ax=ax[0], order=size_order)
sns.boxplot(x='size', y='price_rupiah', data=pizza, ax=ax[1], order=size_order)
plt.show()
source.ff4e586c:
# Topping vs Price
display(pizza.groupby('topping')['price_rupiah'].describe())

fig, ax = plt.subplots(ncols=2, figsize=(14, 6))
sns.countplot(x='topping', data=pizza, ax=ax[0])
sns.boxplot(x='topping', y='price_rupiah', data=pizza, ax=ax[1])
ax[0].set_xticklabels(ax[0].get_xticklabels(), rotation=90)
ax[1].set_xticklabels(ax[1].get_xticklabels(), rotation=90)
plt.show()

# Company vs Price
display(pizza.groupby('company')['price_rupiah'].describe())

fig, ax = plt.subplots(ncols=2, figsize=(14, 6))
sns.countplot(x='company', data=pizza, ax=ax[0])
sns.boxplot(x='company', y='price_rupiah', data=pizza, ax=ax[1])
plt.show()

source.7fa7df47:
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder

columns = ['company', 'topping', 'variant', 'size', 'extra_sauce', 'extra_cheese', 'extra_mushrooms']

le_list = {}

for column in columns:
    encoder = LabelEncoder()
    le_list[column] = encoder
    pizza[column] = encoder.fit_transform(pizza[column])

pizza.head()
